current-chamber.#text: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

official-title.#text:
To provide student loan forgiveness for American Indian educators teaching in local educational
			 agencies with a high percentage of American Indian students.

sponsor.#tail: introduced the following bill; which was read twice and referred to the

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#text: American Indian Teacher Loan Forgiveness Act of 2014
{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: American Indian Teacher Loan Forgiveness Act of 2014

text.#text: This Act may be cited as the

header.#text:
Student loan forgiveness for American Indian educators teaching in local educational agencies with
			 a high percentage of American Indian students

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail:
is amended by adding at
			 the end the following:

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#text: Section 428J(c) of the Higher Education Act of 1965

header.#text:
American Indian teachers in local educational agencies with a high percentage of American Indian
			 students

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail:
shall repay under this section shall be not more than
			 $17,500 in the case of a borrower who—
or in a school overseen by the

section 7112(b) of the Elementary
			 and Secondary Education Act of 1965
